nodes.text: Yoda & The BoogieWookiees was a band that played on Endor in 4 ABY.
The band Yoda & The BoogieWookiees first appeared in LEGO Star Wars: Bombad Bounty. Although their name is not stated aloud, can be seen on Yoda's drumset.
Despite their respective deaths earlier, both Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda can be seen playing in the band.
